Package org.jgrapes.webconlet.oidclogin

package org.jgrapes.webconlet.oidclogin
This package provides an OIDC login conlet (with fallback to password login).
  • Class
    Description
    JsonWebToken
    The Class OidcProviderData.
    LoginConlet
    A login conlet for OIDC based logins with a fallback to password based logins.
    LoginConlet.AccountModel
    Model with account info.
    OidcClient
    Helper component for LoginConlet that handles the communication with the OIDC provider.
    OidcClient.Configuration
    The configuration information.
    OidcError
    The Class OidcError.
    OidcError.Kind
    The error kind.
    OidcProviderData
    The Class OidcProviderData.
    OpenLoginWindow
    The Class OpenLoginWindow.
    StartOidcLogin
    The Class StartOidcLogin.
    TextCollector
    Collects character data from buffers and makes it available as a text.
